title: Dodged Queue?
body: Ok so i was in matchmaking and all of a sudden the queue gets dodged and apparently i was the one that dodged even though i did nothing to dodge the queue and I'm suffering a penalty for it? That's kind of unfair and i don't want this happening especially when i run into ranked games and losing LP over nothing. Help me out Rito

replies.body: I looked into this for you, but I was unable to locate a queue dodge or unusual loss of LP.  If you would like more context into your specific issue, please [contact player support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for that visibility.
